'''''Vinyar Tengwar 34''''' is the thirty-fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|33|35}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Melkor and Ungoliante" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News

* "''[[Morgoth's Ring]]'': A Linguistic Review, Part I" — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter
